title: I Love Veggie Steamboat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Buffet, Malaysian
description: 爱。回锅 is a veggie-based shabu and buffet with a garden-feeling ambiance, comfortable environment. Offers lunch set as well dinner promotions. Serves up to 150 of choices of fresh ingredients, steamboat ingredients, fruits, desserts, chocolate fondue and free-flow drinks. Unlimited cold and hot beverages and desserts after your steamboat buffet.
streetAddress: G-0-5 M Avenue, Jalan Lang Emas, Segambut Bahagia
